price: Esses são alguns informes das cidades: Nós tos narramos, Muhammad. Entre elas, há umas de pé e outras ceifadas.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-qurā naquṣṣuhu ʿalayka min'hā qāimun waḥaṣīdun
